description:
This course provides students with an opportunity to apply all the knowledge and skills developed across the whole course to a research or real world problem. Students will undertake a research project or a program of independent enquiry under the direction of an academic or research staff member. 
Students commencing a year long project in sem 1 enrol in CIVL7500 for sem 1 & sem 2; students commencing a year long project in sem 2 enrol in CIVL7501 for sem 2 & the following sem1.
prerequisites: Permission of Head of School required.
restricted:
BE(Hons)/ME (Civil) or MEngSc (Civil) or ME (Civil)
Students must have a GPA of 5.0 or above.
